}} New Iberia is the parish seat of Iberia Parish, Louisiana, United States. it is the largest city in Iberia Parish and the 13th-largest in the state of Louisiana. ==Sister cities== Flag Cities Countries Woluwe-Saint-Pierre Belgium Fuengirola Spain Saint-Jean-d'Angély France Alhaurín de la Torre Spain ==References== ==Other websites== *City of New Iberia *Shadows-on-the-Teche *The Iberia
